thread.title: Ground News - Mpox in the United States Fast Facts
thread.title_full: Ground News - Mpox in the United States Fast Facts

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Mpox in the United States Fast Facts
text:
Summary by Ground News In 2022, an outbreak was declared a public health emergency of international concern by the World Health Organization (WHO) The virus originated in Africa and is the cousin of the smallpox virus. Anyone can become ill from mpox , but the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention says that more than 99% of mpox cases in the United States in the 2022 outbreak have been among men who have sex with men.
